name: Aniwye
description: The Aniwye is a large monstrosity resembling a skunk, possessing the ability to shapeshift into larger forms such as an ogre or hill giant. It has strong physical features and a notable natural armor.
memorable: Its ability to shapeshift and release a deadly poisonous musk makes it a unique and formidable opponent in combat.
goals: Often seeks to overpower opponents using cunning and strength, navigating various terrains to its advantage.
relations: May be encountered with other monstrosities or as a solitary predator.
environment: Typically found in forests or hilly terrains where it can utilize its climbing speed.
strengths: High physical strength and adaptability in combat due to its shapeshifting ability.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and less effective in social interactions due to negative charisma.
attacks: In combat, it can perform multiple attacks, using slam attacks in larger forms, and a combination of bite and claw strikes in its skunk form.
most_powerful_ability: The Deadly Musk ability that can stun and poison multiple enemies in a large area.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet and keen perception, granting a passive perception score of 16.
skills: Skilled in stealth, making it effective at moving unseen as well as having strong perceptive abilities.
additional_information: Retains statistics when shapeshifting except for size.
Can revert to its skunk form if it takes significant damage while in larger forms.
Capable of burrowing and climbing only in skunk form.
